english.segment1: I cut him up this evening. and when they came to check the scream. on the very spot I'd hidden him. I served a spot of tea
english.segment2: I'd left no evidence. that anything was wrong. but the unnerving sound beneath the floor boards. reminded me of what I'd done
english.segment3: I thought I'd committed. the perfect, fool-proof crime. I never knew how heavy. this would weigh upon my mind
english.segment4: Things done in secret. under cover of night. have a funny way. of being brought into the light
english.segment5: I admit the deed. can't you hear the beating. I admit the deed. I'm being driven mad by the Tell-Tale Heart.
